meta.description: Determine the number of escalators and elevators to install to minimize space while meeting transport capacity and ratio requirements.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_TYPES
sets.description: Types of transport installations available at the airport.

params.name: capacity_per_minute
params.description: Number of people each transport type can move per minute.

params.name: space_per_unit
params.description: Space taken by each unit of transport type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units to install for each transport type.

objective.name: min_total_space
objective.expr: sum(space_per_unit[t] * x[t] for t in TRANSPORT_TYPES)
objective.description: Minimize the total space taken by the installed transport units.

constraints.name: capacity_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the total transport capacity is at least 400 people per minute.

constraints.name: escalator_to_elevator_ratio
constraints.description: Ensure there are at least three times more escalators than elevators.

constraints.name: minimum_elevators
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2 elevators are installed.
